description.p: There are *['template']* and *['htmltemplate']* properties for when mixing static content and data fields.

section.title: Simple Template

description.p: This template generates text that merges field values in to the text.
This example just merges data, it doesn't change the formatting within the text.
Note the *['startnew']* property set to 'Page' indicates that this content should always start on a new page.

section.title: Simple HTML Template

description.p: This template generates html that merges field values in html content.
Being HTML, font styling, justification can be changed within the template, Here we bold the name, and italicize the word 'appointment'.

section.title: Complex Content

description.p: This template complex content using a *['content']* array, it is not as terse as *['htmltemplate']*, but gives you much finer control since you can include document tables, images pagination and section directives.
